technology.description:
Check this to deploy generated Facet navigation components under the web application flolder of your application server.
Facetmap is a library allowing to produce facet navigation through object categories.
technology.name: Facetmap Facet Navigation

technologyVersion.description:
Check this to deploy Facet navigation components on the major release 2 of the Facetmap library.
Facetmap 2.x is one of the more efficient and robust Facet navigation component which may be easily embedded in web application.

deployerVersion.description:
Check this to proceed to a full deployment of the generated xsl Facetmap templates to integrate Facet navigation to your application.
The generated xsl templates may be deployed in any Facetmap instance.

configurationParameter.documentation: Set this value to the web application directory path of the application server where you want to deploy the generated facetmap xsl templates.
configurationParameter.label: Facetmap webapp folder
